LanguageData.AIPawnBaseResearch.label: Mobile AI
LanguageData.AIPawnBaseResearch.description: Researches the basics needed to build yourself a mobile artificial intelligence. This unit can support you and your colony.
LanguageData.AIPawnBaseResearch.descriptionDiscovered: Now you can build a mobile AI (MAI) in the most basic configuration. Advanced programming needs more research. Note: Once produced, an upgrade of your MAI is not possible. She won't allow access to her program.
